Speaker: Jess
Text: Hey| welcome to Information and Technology Secure Support System Solutions!

Speaker: Jess
Text: …Yeah| I know… it's bit of a touchy subject with the higher ups so maybe don’t mention it.

Speaker: Jess
Text: For brevity  we call ourselves ITS4.

Speaker: Jess
Text: Let's get you aquainted with the team.

Speaker: Jess
Text: You already know me| I'm one of the senior project officers.

Speaker: Jess
Text: This here is Evan Fisher| he'll be your number two for anything managirial.

Speaker: Evan
Text: It's a pleasure to meet you|I've heard all about your record and I am very excited to be working under you!
Option1: I'm looking forward to working with you too.
Option3: If you've heard about me| then you should know I don't like suck ups.

Speaker: Evan
Text: Oh ok, I was just trying to be polite.

Speaker: Jess
Text: Next, this is Olivia Finch| she's one of the best technical minds I've ever met.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Ha, Thanks Jess.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Stay out of my work and I'll get anything done for you, got it?
Option3: As your manager I can't make such a promise.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: You're not the first manager I've had and you certainly won't be the last.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Fine, just don't try to micro manage me.

Text: Moving along… we have Wilson Shumer, he runs operational support.

Text: Hi.  *Wilson nervously avoids eye contact*

Text: It's fine.

Text: *Wilson has already focused back into his work*

Text: Lastly we have …

Speaker: Frank
Text: Frank Waters| senior project officer.  It's a pleasure to make your aquantance.
Option1: It's good to meet you Frank.
Option3: Please don't interupt| Jess was already doing a good job introducing us.

Speaker: Frank
Text: Oh it was not my intention to offend| my deepest appologies Jess

Speaker: Jess
Text: That's alright Frank

Speaker: Jess
Text: And that's the team.  Day to day you'll be required to make decisions on how things are run.

Speaker: Jess
Text: ITS4 is not in the greatest shape right now so just do your best to help the company and the team succeed.

Speaker: Jess
Text: You got this! You'll do great!

Speaker: Jess
Text: Alrighty, I'll leave you to it.
*Your desk phone is ringing*
Option3: ITS4 here how can I help you?

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Hello| this is John Bossman. You must be the new manager| I am the CEO of ITS4 and you'll be reporting to me directly.
Option1: Hi John, nice to hear from you

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Call me Sir or Mr. Bossman.
Option3: Come on John| you're my collegue not my father.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: We are not collegues| I am your boss and you will do as I say.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Some things are not worth my time| if you prove to me that you are I will visit in person.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Let me be straight with you.  Your job is to make money.  The bottom line is what matters.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: If you make the company money| you make me happy and when I'm happy you get to continue making that absurd salary we pay you.
Option1: I think we are both going to be very happy by the end of this.

Text: I hope so.

Text: As long as it helps the bottom line.
